channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Application Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Application Gateway

item.title: CVE-2022-22387|2024-09-16T19:55:49.810Z -- ibm -- application%20gateway
item.description: IBM Application Gateway is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 221965.
